name: Crash Course (KamiPenguin)
description:
Reach all the blue checkpoints and reach the finish line to complete the racing course.
You can only use the paddles to steer the car.

How fast can you reach the finish line?!

Controls:
Move paddle:  WASD
Select next paddle: E
Select previous padde: Q
Or
Select paddle by left-clicking on it with a mouse

Restart current course: Spacebar
Exit game: Esc

Credits:
Nicolai - Art, Sound, Music & Level Design
Romi - Programming & Level Design
Jordy - Programming
Roxanne - Programming
